spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placement is mostly correct, but wall alignment has minor deviations. Door and window placements have several inaccuracies.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is inconsistent in some areas. There are missing windows and incorrect door embeddings. Adjacency relationships are mostly correct. No hallucinated rooms.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement has inaccuracies and some items are missing. Scale consistency is fair.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera and orthographic projection appear correct. Lighting is acceptable. Geometry has some minor distortions, and visual clarity is slightly compromised by missing elements.

detected_errors.description: The wall separating 'ACTIVITY' from the staircase area is misaligned; in the 2D plan, it extends further left.
The 'RECESS' area next to the stairs in the 2D plan is represented as a solid wall in the 3D render.
The '13C HIGH CAPPED WALL' detail in the 2D plan is missing a cap in the 3D render.
The door to 'BATH' is misplaced and incorrectly sized; it is a single door in the 3D render, but a wider, recessed opening in the 2D plan.
The door to 'WC' is misplaced; it is further right in the 3D render than in the 2D plan.
The window in 'BED 4' is missing in the 3D render.
The door to 'BED 4' is misplaced relative to the external wall.
The 'A/C' unit shown in the 2D plan near 'WC' and 'BED 4' is missing in the 3D render.
The 'ROBE' in 'BED 4' is missing the bifold/sliding doors indicated in the 2D plan.
One window in 'BED 3' is missing. Only one is present in 3D, two in 2D.
The 'ROBE' in 'BED 3' is missing the bifold/sliding doors indicated in the 2D plan.
The 'A/C' unit shown in the 2D plan near 'BED 3' and 'BED 2' is missing in the 3D render.
The 'LINEN' cupboard near 'BED 2' is missing its doors/recessed opening as shown in the 2D plan.
The window in 'BED 2' is missing in the 3D render.
The 'ROBE' in 'BED 2' is missing the bifold/sliding doors indicated in the 2D plan.
The 'BALUSTRADE' on the 'BALCONY' is shown as a solid wall in the 3D render.
The 'WALL TO 21C AFL' detail indicated on the 2D plan is simplified to a regular wall in the 3D render.
Room proportions appear slightly distorted, e.g., 'ACTIVITY' room feels wider in 3D than suggested by the 2D dimensions, or 'BED 2' might be slightly elongated.
The external wall thickness appears inconsistent, particularly around the recessed balcony area.
The internal circular seating element in 'ACTIVITY' is missing.
Bathroom fixtures (toilet, tub) are slightly misplaced within their respective rooms.
